QuestData.Title: The Battle for Darkshore
QuestData.Description: The ancients of the grove have come to our aid, $n. I can see through their eyes even as we speak.$B$BThe Twilight's Hammer has been forced to hasten their ritual and have thus only managed to resurrect but a remnant of dread Soggoth.$B$BDestroy it before it's too late, $n. I am needed elsewhere.$B$BReturn to the druids at the Grove of the Ancients when it is all over they will direct you further.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Send him back into the depths, where he belongs.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay the Avatar of Soggoth at the Master's Glaive.
QuestData.RewardText: We can finally rest here now, $n. It appears Darkshore has been saved -- and we have you to thank for it.
